description: Detects usage of the "Import-Module" cmdlet to load the "Microsoft.ActiveDirectory.Management.dl" DLL. Which is often used by attackers to perform AD enumeration.
author: frack113
false_positives: Legitimate use of the library for administrative activity
name: Potential Active Directory Enumeration Using AD Module - ProcCreation
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:("PowerShell.EXE" OR "pwsh.dll"))) AND process.command_line.text:(*Import\-Module\ * OR *ipmo\ *) AND process.command_line.text:*Microsoft.ActiveDirectory.Management.dll*)
